title: Vision
description: Empowering students from all backgrounds to learn and love programming, enabling them to teach others.

title: Projects
description: Explore your interests through projects, and find inspiration in the exciting ones we've already created.

title: Mentorship
description: We've set up various platforms for you to share your doubts. Feel free to reach out anytime!

title: Events
description: Explore the upcoming events and join the ones that interest you. We'd love for you to engage with us!

title: Community
description: Join the family and get to know us better! We're excited to connect, interact and share amazing experiences with you.
